'''''The Power of Science is Staggering!''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Meetings in Outrealm: Series IV]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete one form of the "[[Icewind Suite]]" challenge in [[Co-Op Mode]].

==Trivia==
* The achievement's name is a reference to a recurring catchphrase in {{w|Pokémon}}, {{Lang|ja=かがくのちからってすげー!|ja_rm=Kagaku no Chikara tte Sugee!|ja_tl=The power of science is incredible!}}.
** Though usually translated as "The power of science is amazing!" in modern Pokémon games, in {{w|Pokémon Ruby and Sapphire}} and {{w|Pokémon Emerald}}, "The power of science is staggering!" is used instead.
